articles.title: ‘Completely inadequate and inhumane’: Rep. Seth Moulton returns to ICE field office in Burlington
articles.description:
“Candidly, there's no excuse that they have no sleeping mats from June until now,” Moulton said.

The post ‘Completely inadequate and inhumane’: Rep. Seth Moulton returns to ICE field office in Burlington appeared first on Boston.com.
